keyword: calories in a tuna footlong from subway
title: Calories in a Subway Tuna Footlong
meta_description: Discover calories in a tuna footlong from subway, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, sodium, and easy tweaks for customization.
h1: Calories in a Subway Tuna Footlong
assumptions: Standard Subway Tuna Footlong: tuna salad with mayo on 6-grain wheat bread, includes lettuce, tomatoes, onions, green peppers, cucumbers, olives; no extra cheese or sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, bread type, portion sizes, and preparation; check Subway's app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A standard Subway Tuna Footlong contains about 830 calories and 32 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to Italian herb & cheese bread

faqs.q: How many calories in a tuna footlong from Subway?
faqs.a: Approximately 830 calories for a standard version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a Subway tuna footlong?
faqs.a: About 32 g of protein per footlong.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Subway tuna footlong?
faqs.a: Around 1620 mg, mostly from tuna salad and bread.

faqs.q: Can I reduce calories in a tuna footlong from Subway?
faqs.a: Yes, skip mayo to cut ~200 kcal; opt for wheat bread and extra veggies.

faqs.q: Is a Subway tuna footlong low-carb?
faqs.a: No, it has ~80 g carbs mainly from bread; consider a protein bowl alternative.
